mapper.select: SELECT b.booking_id, b.booking_date, b.booking_num, m.title AS movie_title, m.poster_path, c.name AS cinema_name, t.screen_no, s.start_time, s.end_time, ( SELECT LISTAGG(people_type || ':' || count, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY people_type) AS result FROM ( SELECT booking_num, people_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM booking WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY booking_num, people_type ) pd WHERE pd.booking_num = b.booking_num ) AS people_details, ( SELECT LISTAGG(se.seat_row || se.num, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY se.seat_row, se.num) FROM seats se WHERE se.seat_id IN ( SELECT seat_id FROM booking WHERE booking_num = b.booking_num AND user_id = #{userId} ) ) AS seat_numbers FROM booking b JOIN schedule s ON b.schedule_id = s.schedule_id JOIN movies m ON b.movie_id = m.movie_id JOIN cinema c ON s.cinema_id = c.cinema_id JOIN theater t ON s.theater_id = t.theater_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY b.booking_date DESC
